query: INSERT INTO [dbo].[DeliveryResultLog](DeliveryPoolUID, Status, Message, SourceType) VALUES(@DeliveryPoolUID, 5301, 'SMS Message already expired before API access', 'Realtime')

name: MSSQL Report
query: INSERT INTO [dbo].[DeliveryResultLog](DeliveryPoolUID, DeliverySendUID, DeliverySendRecordUID, Status, Message, SourceType) VALUES(@DeliveryPoolUID, @DeliverySendUID, @DeliverySendRecordUID, @ResponseStatus, @ResponseMessage, 'Realtime')

name: Log HTTP Response
func:
msg.ResponseMessage = msg.payload
msg.ResponseStatus = 0
msg.SendUID = JSON.parse(msg.payload)["sendUid"]

msg.SendRecordUID = JSON.parse(msg.payload)["results"][0]["sendRecordUid"] || null

msg.result = "[GRAVITY][ATOMIC] HTTP Post via Message API success"

msg.payload = {
    "channel": "GRAVITY_SMS_MESSAGE_API",
    "level": "INFO",
    "code": 0,
    "msg": msg.result,
    "time": (new Date()).toJSON(),
    "payload": {
        "DeliveryPoolUID": msg.DeliveryPoolUID,
        "SendUID": msg.SendUID,
        "SendRecordUID": msg.SendRecordUID
    }
}

return msg
